name: obsidian-get-note
description: Retrieve note content by filename from Obsidian vault

arguments.name: filename
arguments.desc: The filename of the note to retrieve (e.g., 'my-note.md')

name: obsidian-create-note
description: Create a new note in Obsidian vault with optional frontmatter

arguments.name: filename
arguments.desc: The filename for the new note (e.g., 'new-note.md')

arguments.name: frontmatter
arguments.desc: Optional frontmatter metadata as key-value pairs

name: obsidian-update-note
description: Update an existing note with new content and optional frontmatter

arguments.name: filename
arguments.desc: The filename of the note to update

arguments.name: content
arguments.desc: The new content for the note

arguments.name: frontmatter
arguments.desc: Optional frontmatter metadata as key-value pairs

name: obsidian-delete-note
description: Delete a note from the Obsidian vault

arguments.name: filename
arguments.desc: The filename of the note to delete

name: obsidian-search-notes
description: Search for notes containing specific text in Obsidian vault

arguments.name: query
arguments.desc: The search query text to find in notes

name: obsidian-list-files
description: List all files and folders in the Obsidian vault

arguments.name: path
arguments.desc: Optional path to list files from (defaults to root)

name: obsidian-get-vault-info
description: Get vault information and statistics from Obsidian

name: obsidian-create-folder
description: Create a new folder in the Obsidian vault

arguments.name: path
arguments.desc: The path of the folder to create

name: obsidian-get-tags
description: Get all tags used in the Obsidian vault

name: obsidian-ping
description: Check connectivity with the Obsidian Local REST API server
